reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The flagship initiative of the UNAOC Youth Programme is the Youth Solidarity Fund (YSF) - a unique programme offering support to outstanding youth organizations for the implementation of their own projects advancing the objectives of the UNAOC. This suppor t takes the shape of funding training technical assistance documentation networking and access to government decision-makers promotion of project results participation in the UNAOC Annual Forums dissemination of lessons learned opportunities to mentor and a continued partnership.YSF 2012: Objectives Activities and Expected OutcomesAssessing the proposals funded through the previous YSF editions it is expected that to a degree applicable for a specific country or community the winning projects might aim for the following (one of more objectives combined):Foster understanding and cooperative relations among youth in order to counter forces which use cultural differences in divisive ways, Promote reconciliation amongst youth in communities which have been polar ized socially and politically along ethnic religious or language lines, Build a network of youth who can facilitate dialogue between their respective communities and act as a force of moderation and understanding during times of heightened political cultur al religious and ethnic tensions, Foster involvement of marginalized youth in decision making processes, empower youth to enter dialogue with local authorities.
